EEG Features
============
This section contains the definitions and calculations of multiple quantitative features for EEG data analysis, including temporal features, frequency features and multi-channel features. Click the contents below to check the detail of each feature category.

Temporal Features
-----------------
Temporal features describe the characteristics of EEG signal along the time.

1. Mean

2. Standard Deviation

3. 


References


Frequency Features
------------------
Frequency features describe the characteristics of EEG signal in frequency domain.

1. 

2. 

References


Multi-Channel Features
----------------------
Multi-channel features describe the difference of EEG signals between multiple channels, especially channels with symmetric distribution.
